epic.name: Android: Rebuild all native modules with gradle
epic.summary: Android: Rebuild all native modules with gradle

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Module needs to be rebuilt for Titanium 9.0.0 to support the following:
* Built as an Android "AAR" library.
* Provide a "POM" file defining its dependencies. (Resolves library version conflicts.)
* Support AndroidX libraries.
* Add x86_64 architecture support.

Repository:
https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.worker

comments.body: Closing, as we are not maintaining this module.
